title: Ropsten chain not working
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.8.12
OS & Version: linux

#### Expected behaviour
Sync to ropsten test network

#### Actual behaviour
Sync stalls 

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Geth --testnet 

#### Backtrace

You've encountered a sought after, hard to reproduce bug. Please report this to the developers <3 https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues
